avalancheActivity.highlights: Freeze thaw cycles recently have made the snow pack stable in most places

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has melted considerably and the snow pack is considered stable in most places.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of avalnche activity in the last few days. Snow has subsided and become rather stable after freeze and thaw cycles. Short lived rain in lowland and snow in mountians on Thursday night and possibley some light snow accumulation, especially in the north and the westfjords. Snow might become wet again on Sunday in the east with rain and warm temperatures.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable after a cycle of freeze and thaw. Some new snow accumulation possible on Thursday and the weekend in the east.

weatherForecast.highlights: Áfram austlægar áttir, rigning með köflum og frekar hlýtt í veðri en styttiru upp og kólnar á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has melted or settled in most places and is considered generally stable. Some new snow possible in highest mountains on Thursday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Old snow in the mountains that has melted and subsided. Small windslabs could be present in isolated areas at high elevations on N-NE aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of avalnche activity in the last few days. Snow has subsided and become rather stable after freeze and thaw cycles. Short lived rain in lowland and snow in mountians on Thursday night and possibley some light snow accumulation, especially in the north and the westfjords. Snow might become wet again on Sunday in the east with rain and warm temperatures.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable after a cycle of freeze and thaw. Some new snow accumulation possible on Thursday and the weekend in the east.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýr í NA-átt og einhver slydda/ringing á láglenid á fimmtudag en snjókoma í hæstu fjöll, skammvinn úrkoma og ekki mikill snjór sem safnas. Kólnar og þurrt á föstudag og laugardag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has melted widely after thaw and freeze cycles and is considered mostly stable. Some new snow possible in mountains after some light snowfall on Thursday night.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has subsided considerabley and thaw and freeze cycles have made the snow mostly stable. Some new snow is possible in moutains after some light snowfall on Thursday night.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of avalnche activity in the last few days. Snow has subsided and become rather stable after freeze and thaw cycles. Short lived rain in lowland and snow in mountians on Thursday night and possibley some light snow accumulation, especially in the north and the westfjords. Snow might become wet again on Sunday in the east with rain and warm temperatures.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable after a cycle of freeze and thaw. Some new snow accumulation possible on Thursday and the weekend in the east.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar eða breytilegr áttir og þurrt að mestu og hiti undir frostmarki. Lægð fer norður fyrir land á föstudag með úrkomuskil sem er óvíst hvort nái inná land, ef svo fer gæti snjóað lítið eitt á laugardag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has become wet in the last few days, with rain and temperature above freezing point in mountain elevation. The old snow is considered stable after thaw and freeze cycles.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has become wet in the last few days, with rain and temperature above freezing point in mountain elevation. The old snow is considered stable after thaw and freeze cycles.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of avalnche activity in the last few days. Snow has subsided and become rather stable after freeze and thaw cycles. Short lived rain in lowland and snow in mountians on Thursday night and possibley some light snow accumulation, especially in the north and the westfjords. Snow might become wet again on Sunday in the east with rain and warm temperatures.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable after a cycle of freeze and thaw. Some new snow accumulation possible on Thursday and the weekend in the east.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar áttir og úrkoma með köflum næstu daga, rigning á láglendi en slydda eða snjókoma í fjalla hæð. Vægt frost til fjalla næstu daga. Líkur á hlýindum og talsverðri rigningu á sunnudag.
